remark.ch: 初級課程，限修過韓語一A且成績及格者選修。

goal.en: 1. Improve student‘s listening and speaking ability by practicing pronunciation and basic sentence patterns. 2. Let student understand the Korean grammar structure and expression by explaining and practicing basis sentence pattern of the text. 3. Learn to use Korean in real life through k-pop and Korean TV program.
goal.ch: 1. 透過練習發音及基本會話來增進學生聽、說之能力。 2. 配合課文內容解說文法規則及基本句型，了解韓文的結構和表達方式。 3. 透過k-pop和韓國影視節目更加理解韓文的使用方法。
